rules_text: Whenever Uprooted Stalker becomes tapped, target creature or Vehicle you control gains menace until end of turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“If there's any solace to take here, it's this: the forest despises Crain just as much as we, and it is far less scared.”
—Captain Holly Dee[/i]
